summary: This module implements a SecretsProvider that integrates Metaflow with Azure Key Vault, handling secret identifier parsing, retrieval, base64 decoding, and rigorous validation of secret names, paths, types, versions, and vault domains. It defines a set of specialized exceptions to signal specific validation failures.
business_intent: Allow Metaflow users to securely fetch and validate configuration and credential data stored in Azure Key Vault as part of workflow execution.
